channel.title: Awesome :d
channel.description:
My bro bought a SD card and then got homebrew channel and some old games on the SD card and now we're playing them all!
Basically, homebrew is illegal channel for Wii, but it's free.
Read moar if you have Wii: http://wiibrew.org/w/index.php?title=Homebrew_apps
We almost beat Super Mario World (beat all of starland and made the koopas pumpkins) and I'm up to ice cap zone on Sonic 3 (Favorite sega genesis game and level)
...
Really fun. TBH I prefer these old games over new games.
BTW, best themes ever: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hYxlqTpZ-24 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mtQtbWifobQ
